confirm_delete_attachment.title: Delete delivery proof?

shipment_hand_over.enter_code: Please enter the pickup code called by the customer

edit_fee.edit_information: Please edit the information that you want to update. The total amount will be updated.

add_fee.specify_fee: Please specify the fee you want to add

cancel_order_creation.title: Cancel order creation?
cancel_order_creation.content: The changes you have made will not be saved

change_supplier.title: Change the supplier
change_supplier.content: Are you sure you want to change the supplier? The selected products will be removed

cancel_order_edition.title: Cancel modification of the order
cancel_order_edition.content: Are you sure you want to cancel modification of the order?

cancel_receive_reception.title: Cancel reception
cancel_receive_reception.content: Are you sure you want to cancel reception process?

confirm_reception.title: Complete the reception
confirm_reception.content: All items from the delivery will be declared, and the stock will be adjusted

confirm_delete_expedition_attachment.title: Delete delivery note?
confirm_delete_expedition_attachment.content: Are you sure you want to delete the delivery note? Once deleted, it will not be accessible anymore
